__prompts__.package_name: Python package name. Must follow PEP8 naming convention.
__prompts__.project_name: Python project name [defaults to package_name - recommended]. Must follow PEP8 naming convention.
__prompts__.project_slug: Root directory of the project [defaults to package_name - recommended]
__prompts__.description: One line description of your project. Used as headline in READEME.md, project docstring and PyPI page
__prompts__.add_ml_deps: Adds common ML packages as dependencies.
__prompts__.init_repo: Initialize git repo and make first commit
__prompts__.conda_env_name: Conda evironment name to be used by tmux sessionizer script. See READEM.md
